channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Keir Starmer refuses to condemn US attack on Venezuela as Maduro is jailed in New York – live
item.description: President Nicolás Maduro is expected to make an initial appearance in Manhattan federal court on Monday after capture by US forces Full report: Trump ...

item.title: Leading UK far-right activist spoke at Russian extreme nationalist event
item.description: Exclusive: Patriotic Alternative’s Mark Collett addressed forum along with ideologue described as ‘Putin’s brain’ The head of a leading British far-ri...

item.title: Guardian readers raise £750,000 for charities uniting divided communities
item.description: Hope appeal supports causes battling backdrop of extremist violence, anti-migrant rhetoric and racism Donate to the charity appeal here The Guardian’s...

item.title: Spycops sent thousands of surveillance reports to MI5, inquiry documents reveal
item.description: Security Service was able to compile detailed files on members of legitimate protest groups infiltrated by undercover police officers Thousands of sur...

item.title: ‘Once whispered, now discussed’: the rise of dubious claims of civil war in the UK
item.description: Dystopian warnings once reserved for the far right have found a wider audience – but there are good reasons for scepticism It is a darkly dystopian vi...

item.title: Sheff Utd v Oxford among numerous EFL games off
item.description: Sunday's Championship game between Sheffield United and Oxford United is one of numerous EFL matches postponed because of frozen pitches.

item.title: Police identify 16 more victims of Swiss bar fire
item.description: A criminal investigation has been launched into the fire, with families now facing an agonising wait to identify missing loved ones.

item.title: 'I can't believe it' - Joy and uncertainty in Florida's 'Little Venezuela'
item.description: Celebrations have swept across Florida's Doral, even as questions linger over Venezuela's future.

item.title: Who's in charge of Venezuela and what happens next?
item.description: Donald Trump says the US will "run" Venezuela until a "safe" transition after capturing its president and first lady.

item.title: Wicked composer latest to cancel Kennedy Center gig after Trump name change
item.description: Stephen Schwartz says he will not appear at the arts venue as it "has now become an ideological statement".
